alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 3:21PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge, Wilcox and Telfair Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Juliette, Griffin, East Juliette, West Macon, Dames Ferry, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Hawkinsville, Clinchfield, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Abbeville. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Minor flooding of lowlands adjacent to the river continue to expand into the flood plain. Flooding of the nearby park and parking lot at the Abbeville boat ramp also expands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 11.3 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 12.6 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
